name: Soul Defender: Origins
description:
Project based on game, in-development, titled: "Soul Defender".

Fiends have taken over not only the lands of people, but even their souls! A brave party journey to seek out every last Fiend Lord; and wipe out their infernal Soul Pylons. Who are the Fiends? What are the Pylons actually for?

Discover a glimpse of their origin story, in Soul Defender: Origin!

Made for RPG Maker Web Forum contest: "Let's Make a Scene: Sounds of Harmony".
https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/lets-make-a-scene-sounds-of-har...

Project Auto-Plays once START is pressed.

Songs used in this project:

  •  Tokyo Poetry by ayato sound create from Tokyo Poetry
  • The Voice of the Wind by Tyler Cline from Tyler Cline’s Cinematic Fantasy Music Pack
  • A Battle Awaits by Sonancy Designs from JRPG and Fantasy Music Vol.1
  • DFRM1_BGM09_Field_Town by TK.Projects from Dramatic Fantasy RPG Music Vol.1
